thread.section_title: B&H Photo-Video Reviews | Customer Service Reviews of B&H Photo-Video | www.bhphotovideo.com
thread.title: JEFFREY

author: JEFFREY
title: JEFFREY
text: I've been involved in professional corporate and documentary sound for video for most of my career and am now finding that BandH is carrying even the most obscure and hard to find items that one might need as a professional sound person. I would always go to the professional audio only stores and websites in the past, but now I find myself buying a good deal of equipment from BandH too.
